column1: Russia's attacks on Ukraine is continuing unabated on the second day, and the capital Kyiv has been targeted in a series of explosions. Reports say Ukrainian forces are engaging with Russian soldiers just outside the capital city. The Ukrainian president has said that 137 people were killed on the first day of Russian invasion, including civilians. Pictures have emerged of some apartment blocks in Kyiv heavily damaged in air strikes. MEA is sending teams to four points on Ukraine's borders with Romania, Poland, Hungary and the Slovak Republic to assist in evacuation of Indian nationals.
